amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute expresses the sense of the House regarding the condition and humanitarian needs of refugees within Kosovo.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the preamble and insert a new text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Brady (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brady (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
